name: ANTSJacobian
author: ANTs Developers
description: Calculate the Jacobian determinant of a transformation using ANTs. WARNING: ANTSJacobian may not be working correctly; see CreateJacobianDeterminantImage for an alternative method.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input image.

inputs.name: Output File
inputs.description: The prefix for the output files.

inputs.name: Use Log
inputs.description: Whether to use logarithm in computation.

inputs.name: Mask File
inputs.description: Mask file used in the computation.

inputs.name: Normalize by Total
inputs.description: Normalize the Jacobian by the total in the mask. Use this to adjust for head size.

inputs.name: Projection Vector
inputs.description: Projects the warp along the specified direction. Do not add this option if no projection is desired.

output-files.name: Jacobian Output
output-files.description: Output file containing the Jacobian determinant information.
